messages.message: Heyo team, is anyone familiar how FE displays OCR confidence in build? I don't see it as a value in the `GET /extracted_fields` resp, where model conf is, nor do I see it the resp body of `GET /load_record` which is the one API i could think of that could store ocr info. But ya, I'm wondering because I'm working on reading ocr confidence of single-class fields for future case field calculation
its a property `ocr_confidence` in your screenshot (value is 1)

here’s an example (https://github.com/instabase/instabase/blob/master/webserver/shared/src/js/webpacked/apps/src/aihub/components/Validations/OcrConfidencePill.tsx#L46) on how we use it on the frontend
Oh woah, how’d I miss that, thanks :pray:
its ok, I missed it too LOL
